biotools.summary: HyperBeta is a tool for the automatic identification and visualization of beta-structures in molecular dynamics files produced using the MARTINI force field. HyperBeta explots graph theory to identify the beta sheets, and was specifically designed to investigate the emergence of regular structures and patterns in self-assembly polypeptides.
